mapper.insert: INSERT INTO selectone (select_title, select_category, select_content, select_itemA, select_itemB ) VALUES (#{select_title},#{select_category},#{select_content},#{select_itemA},#{select_itemB} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM selectone WHERE select_pk > 0 ORDER BY select_pk DESC
SELECT * FROM selectone WHERE select_pk > 0 ORDER BY select_pk DESC LIMIT #{skip}, #{amount}
SELECT count(*) FROM selectone WHERE select_pk > 0
mapper.update: UPDATE selectone SET select_hit = select_hit + 1 WHERE select_pk = #{select_pk}

UPDATE selectone SET select_title = #{select_title}, select_category=#{select_category}, select_content = #{select_content}, select_itemA=#{select_itemA}, select_itemB=#{select_itemB} WHERE select_pk = #{select_pk}
